data.message: Go back to the old feed!! The new one takes up so much space on my screen for one story that I have to scroll for what feels like an hour just to see my friends posts from one day!!! Take off the entire Top stories and make it most recent only!! Go back to the way it was because the new design is absolutely awful!!

replies.message: Hi Christina. We appreciate your feedback. We're working hard to ensure that our updates improve Facebook for everyone. We'll pass along these suggestion to our team. You can also let us know what would make Facebook more enjoyable here: http://on.fb.me/1gv5Qnv Thanks much! -Leigh

Hi Leigh. I appreciate your feedback I'm working hard to ensure that your updates improve my Facebook experience. Pass it along to your team. Change it BACK!!! Hope I can soon start enjoying my Facebook experiance again soon. Thanks much! John Mooney.
You could also go back to the ime when you had the option of viewing most recent and selecting game feeds. I know a lot of people who would appreciate that!
